format:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":15801,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5991a48d-b217-473b-82c9-4935dbc4c6e0/upsa2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5991a48d-b217-473b-82c9-4935dbc4c6e0/upsa2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"upsa2.png\",\"name\":\"upsa2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5991a48d-b217-473b-82c9-4935dbc4c6e0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":461,\"height\":220.99999999999997},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Updating emergency contacts\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order to keep your Resource Manager aware of your location in any emergency case (if you do not come to work or cannot answer the call, for example), please add a contact for emergency communications to your UPSA profile: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Go to UPSA > My Profile > Edit my profile > Additional > Enter a phone number with an international code.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Certifications\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is important for the company to keep track of employees’ current certifications. Please include all of your certifications in your UPSA profile. More information on certifications can be found \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/UPSA/Trainings+and+certifications\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HERE\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"*If you have already passed or are planning to take Microsoft Certification exams, you can associate your Microsoft Certification Accounts with EPAM on Microsoft Partner Center. It will help EPAM track our certifications/exams, which will give us the opportunity to demonstrate Microsoft our strong technical skills and receive more interesting projects from them. It will also help you with your skills recognition.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Adding information on past projects\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Information on past projects reflects both your previous project work at EPAM and elsewhere and completed tasks. This lets EPAM see the full history of your past work, including expertise and technologies, and lets resource managers across the company find your profile according to set criteria. This is useful not only for project staffing but also, for example, finding expertise on specific technologies.
